蚙蚙蚙

蚙字的基本解释

蚙
qín
〔蚙穷〕即“蚰蜒”，俗称“草鞋虫”，如“昌羊去蚤虱而人弗席者，为其来蚙蚙也。”

蚙
qián
虾、蟹的足爪。

蚙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qín］
［《集韻》渠今切，平侵，羣。］
(1)见“蚙窮”。
(2)虫名。
[②]［qián］
［《集韻》其淹切，平鹽，羣。］
虾蟹的足爪。

蚙字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚙； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1078第05
【集韻】渠今切，音琴。【類篇】蟲連行紆行者。【淮南子·說林訓】昌羊去蚤虱，而來蚙窮。　又其淹切，音鈐。蝦蟹距也。

蚙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蚙字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm
Basic explanation of words
Worm
qín
〔蚙Qiang〕 means "scorpion", commonly known as "straw-shoe worm", such as "Changyang flea and lice, and people who flies, come for them.
Worm
qián
Shrimp and crab feet.
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qín］
["Ji Yun" Qu Jin cut, flat invasion, group. ]
(1) See "Qiaoqiong".
(2) Insect name.
[②]［qián］
["Jiyun" its submerged cut, flat salt, group. ]
Shrimp and crab feet.
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚙; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1078 Page 05
[Ji Yun] Qu Jin cut, sound piano. 【Classes】Chonglian Xingxing. [Huainanzi·Said Lin Xun] Changyang went to flea and lice, but came to be poor.　 It drowns and cuts again, the sound seal. Shrimp and crab distance also.
